Section strict_ring_apart.
  Context `{FullPseudoSemiRingOrder R}.

  Definition positive_apart_zero (z : R) (Pz : 0 < z) : z ‚â∂ 0
    := pseudo_order_lt_apart_flip 0 z Pz.
  Definition negative_apart_zero (z : R) (Nz : z < 0) : z ‚â∂ 0
    := pseudo_order_lt_apart z 0 Nz.

End strict_ring_apart.

Section another_ring_order.
  Context `{IsRing R1} `{!SemiRingOrder R1le} `{IsRing R2} `{R2le : Le R2}
    `{is_mere_relation R2 R2le}.

  
R1:Type
Aplus:Plus R1
Amult:Mult R1
Azero:Zero R1
Aone:One R1
Anegate:Negate R1
H:IsRing R1
R1le:Le R1
SemiRingOrder0:SemiRingOrder R1le
R2:Type
Aplus0:Plus R2
Amult0:Mult R2
Azero0:Zero R2
Aone0:One R2
Anegate0:Negate R2
H0:IsRing R2
